title: 侵侵危機 - 公開小抗疫小組首席科學家Fauci

replies.msg:
President Donald Trump says comments by his top science adviser, who claimed that it was too early to reopen schools in the United States, were "unacceptable".

Dr Anthony Fauci contradicted Mr Trump, who has said the White House has set a target of having 100 million vaccine doses by the autumn, when he told a Senate committee on Tuesday that neither a vaccine or treatment could be developed and distributed in time for schools to reopen in the autumn.

Mr Trump said Dr Fauci’s cautious message was “unacceptable”. He said: "I was surprised by his answer. To me it’s not an acceptable answer especially when it comes to schools."

The president accused Dr Fauci, the top disease expert in the US, of wanting "to play all sides of the equation".



https://www.telegraph.co.uk/global-health/science-and-disease/coronavirus-news-testing-boris-johnson-care-homes-cases-deaths/
